title: Romania's Rush To Judge Ceausescu Haunts Retired General
teaser: Andrei Kemenici, who was a colonel then, says he still thinks about the 4 days he held Romanian dictator Nicolae Ceausescu and his wife in custody before their execution 25 years ago on Christmas Day.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
